title: ICSI Releases CS June 2026 Examination Time Table
content:
# ICSI Releases CS June 2026 Examination Time Table

Ek important update hai Company Secretary aspirants ke liye! The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne CS June 2026 examination ka time table announce kar diya hai. This is crucial for all students preparing for the upcoming exams.

Here are the key details:

*   **Examination Period:** The CS Executive and Professional Programme examinations (under Syllabus 2022) will commence on June 1, 2026, and conclude on June 7, 2026.
*   **Exam Timings:** All examination papers will be conducted in a single shift from 9:00 AM to 2:15 PM. An additional 15 minutes (from 9:00 AM to 9:15 AM) will be provided for reading the question paper.
*   **Applicable Syllabus:** The examinations will be held for candidates appearing under the 2022 Syllabus.
*   **Reserve Dates:** ICSI has also kept June 8, 9, and 10, 2026, as reserve dates to accommodate any unforeseen circumstances or exigencies.

Aspiring Company Secretaries can now plan their study schedule accordingly for the June 2026 session.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icsi.edu/whats_new_icsi/)

*Published on: 31 December 2025*
